entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
